title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync (1GILQD5)
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync (1GILQD5)
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project) then overwriting the exported jar file the second time, an out of sync message is shown.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to avoid the out of sync message when overwriting it.
SR:
1. Open a directory (project) in the software.
2. Export the directory as a jar file.
3. Place the exported jar file in the same directory (project).
4. Overwrite the exported jar file.
5. Verify that an out of sync message is displayed.
